# variants

**Type Property**

An array of variants that an asset contains.

## Declaration

```swift
static var variants: AVAsyncProperty<Root, [AVAssetVariant]> { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsynchronousKeyValueLoading/load(_:isolation:)] method to retrieve the property value.

Some variants may not be playable according to the current device configuration.
title: variants
